Reviews.Title: THE WORSE PHONE AND SELLER EVER
Reviews.Author: Margarita G
Reviews.Content: VERY VERY DISAPPOINTED ABOUT THE PRODUCT AND THE SELLER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!THE PHONE WAS WITH SOME KIND OF CHINESE SOFTWARE AND MANY OTHER CHINESE APPLICATIONS THAT CANNOT BE UNINSTALLED!!!!!!!!!!!!!THE SELLER TAKES COUPLE DAYS TO RESPOND BACK TO YOU AND IN ORDER TO THAT THEY WOULD CHARGE YOU FOR EVERY SINGLE THING. PLEASE GUYS IF YOU EVER GONNA BYE ANYTHING FROM THIS SELLER READ VER VERY CAREFULLY THE RETURN POLICY: "Calculating Your RefundThe following conditions and exceptions apply:Any item that is not in its original condition, is damaged, missing original packaging or is missing parts for reasons not due to our error: up to 50% of item's price.A Restocking fee will be applied on all open items. The restocking fee will be based on the condition and usage of the item upon return. Restocking fees start at 15% of the cost paid. Item must be inspected before restocking fee can be determined.Packages sent back "Unopened" will not be charged a restocking fee but will be charged a $25 fee for having the package returned to sender. Seal must not be broken."

Reviews.Title: great phone, huge screen, fast
Reviews.Author: SRS
Reviews.Content: My daughter love it. I have a Galaxy SIII. The LG Optimus L9 is a good replacement for half the price. Under the sun light the galaxy SIII screen beats by far the LG. , The SII is too wide. had=rd to find car mounts. The LG doesn't have that problem. Is not as wide as the SIII. The phone is very responsive.No problem with a pay as you go SIM. Works very fast with WiFi N.

Reviews.Title: Best phone i've ever had, so far...
Reviews.Author: Zinab
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone on 31st of July and to my surprise i received it on the 5th of August which is a good thing because i needed to use a new phone badly, and its been great. I love all the features that comes with it. I have no doubt that LG is one of the most leading brands in technology. I say well done to LG. The price is cool but the phone comes with a lot of Goodies and surprises. Thanks Amazon for a good customer service.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Diego Acuña
Reviews.Content: The phone was shipped and delivered really quick.It came well packaged, in perfect conditions.It's an excellent phone, nothing to complaint about it.The only bad thing I have to say is that unfortunately the phone does not come with spanish as a language (it was a gift for my nephew, who doesn't speak english. Fortunately, he is in the process of learning so at the end he liked it). I am taking just one star off 'cause I guess that was my bad not to check for spanish support.Overall, great phone, great seller, great option!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jose Rosales
Reviews.Content: Product delivery on time, excellent service. And the phone is good quality and is excellent.I really like the 8MP camera that is unlike other phones I have had, excellent resolution of the screen of 4.7 inches.The battery is long lasting.I recommend the whole community of amazon

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: hi
Reviews.Content: In my record u will i bought 2of this fone i was satisfy.th 3rd one i bought with SHOPEBEST doesnt have good reception with my operator.3days latter i ask to return it th seller want charge me 50% of my purchase...

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Nicolas (Vzla)
Reviews.Content: It is a fast, easy to use phone, it works for any operator worldwide and works with all 3G frequencies, it is best

Reviews.Title: It does not work. Its a completely dead phone ...
Reviews.Author: Shyamalee
Reviews.Content: It does not work. Its a completely dead phone. And it was never launched in India so I cannot get it repaired as well.

Reviews.Title: The phone is excellent.
Reviews.Author: HELLER BIANCHI
Reviews.Content: The cell comes complete with expesificaciones but not give it 5 stars for three main reasons the first Android system is not the last. 2do. manual comes in several languages ​​less in Spanish, big mistake. and 3rd. Liberty espress company is pesima slow in moving more than two months to reach Caracas-Venezuela. so another manufacturer sent me the cell, which was solisite high regards and conditions.Sorry for not answering your survey on time but Liberty Express are very messy and transfer of information, do not complain that the product came well packed but since they changed the format dela pag. web, everything has been a disaster. I recommend the phone is compatible with Movistar and Digitel companies in Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: Good Experience.
Reviews.Author: Eldalis Uriepe
Reviews.Content: Good experience!!! I think it is one of the best online stores to buy comfortable room to worldwide, and easy access.

Reviews.Title: I loved it, it is better than expected, very pleased with what I bought, perfect in every.  graciess!! ... ...
Reviews.Author: Dewis Diaz
Reviews.Content: I loved it, it is better than expected, very pleased with what I bought, perfect in every.  graciess!! ... ...

Reviews.Title: still waiting
Reviews.Author: eve
Reviews.Content: I have not yet receive my phone so I can not honestly rate it but my brother has the l6 and loves it this is the l9 so I hope its just as good if not better

Reviews.Title: lg optimus L9
Reviews.Author: Jene
Reviews.Content: this phone is a good size and its weight is not that bad it is very light. and the screen is a good size and it is bright. it works great for what i need, but some of the apps on the phone don't really need but there there and easy to get threw things on the phone.

Reviews.Title: The phone has no IMEI REGISTERED INTERNALLY
Reviews.Author: JOSE HURTADO
Reviews.Content: I have to present a problem with the phone ... when the phone arrived in Venezuela and try putting on FAILED card without the phone has not registered the IMEI INTERNALLY ... just this in the battery and on the box that I have ... to do? I demand of solution of the problem.

Reviews.Title: I love LG, this is an excellent product in all its aspects. regarding cell refers LG always recommend to people I know. It is go
Reviews.Author: jramos1967
Reviews.Content: I love LG, this is an excellent product in all its aspects. regarding cell refers LG always recommend to people I know. It is good choice.

Reviews.Title: highly recomend it to any one
Reviews.Author: Alsari
Reviews.Content: very nice phone,not a good reception in closed steel building,but over all it a good buyfor the discount price listed price

Reviews.Title: its great!
Reviews.Author: Alvaro Flamenco
Reviews.Content: This device is very modern and usefull.has a nice design. I likes your wide screen (4,3 in). I can view a video on youtube very clear and load very fast.I am realy very glad to purchased this device, its great.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Yedeling P. Danvide
Reviews.Content: My Fiancee has real connection issues in her apartment. That is why we bought and returned so many phones. I expected Nokia to be a good connector bit it came with micro simcard. LG was D, my fiancee's choice an guess what: no phones have ver given her so much connection is my memory. I could buy it my self but I do love big phones. I will recommend LG Optimus to anyone experience connection issues in their accommodation.

Reviews.Title: Just love it.
Reviews.Author: Marialys Scarano
Reviews.Content: I love all the features that comes with it. Just really love it. It's easy to use. Good work LG.

Reviews.Title: Rodolfo Hurtado
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Hurtado
Reviews.Content: not have the Spanish language within the phone operating system, even when the software update is not available this language. It is unfortunate that is not available to be such a good phone.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Cell
Reviews.Author: Onide S. Ruiz M.
Reviews.Content: The phone is working well. This filled my expectations,it is a fantastic phone, connectivity, camera, everything is perfect!Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, great company.
Reviews.Author: Angel Castillo
Reviews.Content: What can I say that people don't already know about the LG L9? It's a great phone from a great company. Too bad my daughter recently lost it.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Kirby Toussaint
Reviews.Content: I love devices that has lots of features for half the price.Purchasing the lg optimus l9 p768 was the best decision I made for the year. The features are great and the phone doesn't lagg. I added an external card and and transferred movies, TV shows, over 3000 pictures plus downloaded apps that I occasionally use and it responds well. Very happy to have purchased this phone on the 5th of December 2013 and got it the 9th of December .

Reviews.Title: NOT a 3G phone in the USA
Reviews.Author: Matthew B Burton
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY this phone if you want 3G.  the only network it works on in the US is T-Mobile, and it only works on their EDGE network which is much slower than 3G or even 2G.  AT&T; doesnt even support this phone in the US.I unfortunately bought it and realized this after taking it over to t-moble AND at&t; to try to get it activated.The worst part is this DISHONEST vendor STILL CHARGES RESTOCKING even-though the product is blatantly different than the description leads you to believe.  So I only got 80% of my money back AND had to pay the $20 bucks in postage to send it back...merry christmas to you too SHOPEBESTI wish I could give 0 stars.

Reviews.Title: Nice product,
Reviews.Author: FarLara
Reviews.Content: This is a very good phone compare with payed prices with a wide and illuminate screen.. the phone has some applications in Chinese that can be easily erase from the Android .. I am very pleased with this purchase ..

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: EDUARDO RODRIGUEZ
Reviews.Content: This is a good product i recommend it! It works great, fast and worth the price. Good Choice. buy it...

Reviews.Title: great smartphone for a very reasonable price!
Reviews.Author: maribelle vivar
Reviews.Content: The phone works very well . I like the size, it is not too big nor too small. It is perfect for me. I will recommend this to anyone. I simply love it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Kathi Duffy
Reviews.Content: I have been very impressed with the phone.  Actuallly, it has more features than I expected.  It was very easy to set up with my carrier and I was up and running very quickly.

Reviews.Title: I want my money back
Reviews.Author: Beatriz Pinto Tovar
Reviews.Content: i bought two cell phones and they sent me two balls and a few pens. I want my money back

Reviews.Title: i got another item
Reviews.Author: MilanEtiko
Reviews.Content: i cant even rate something i dont havei got the wrong item , i paid for the optimus l9 p768 and i got another lg korea version thats why i got pissed and i cant rate this item at all!!!! cuz im not totally satisfied

ProductInfo.Features:
2G:GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 / 3G:HSDPA 900 / 2100 / Phone Dimensions: 131.9 x 68.2 x 9.1 mm (5.19 x 2.69 x 0.36 in)/ Weight: 125 g / Display Size; 540 x 960 pixels, 4.7 inches (~234 ppi pixel density)
Internal Memory:4 GB, 1 GB RAM / Card Slot:microSD, up to 32 GB / GPRS: yes / EDGE: Yes / Speed:HSDPA, 21 Mbps; HSUPA, 5.76 Mbps / WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi Direct, Wi-Fi hotspot, DLNA
Camera:5 MP, 2592 x 1944 pixels (LG P760), 8MP (LG P768) autofocus, LED flash / OS:Android OS, v4.0.4 (Ice Cream Sandwich) / CPU:Dual-core 1 GHz Cortex-A9 / Browser : HTML5 /
Java: Yes, via Java MIDP emulator- SNS integration - Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic - QMemo, QTranslator - DivX/Xvid/MP4/H.264/H.263/WMV player - MP3/WAV/WMA/eAAC+ player - Document editor - Photo viewer/editor - Organizer - Google Search, Maps, Gmail - YouTube, Google Talk - Voice memo/dial/commands - Predictive text input
ProductInfo.Name: New Factory Unlocked LG Optimus L9 P768 White International GSM Android Phone HSDPA 900 / 2100 on 3G
